quagga.input.subject: HBA 2000 Summer Clerkship Program
quagga.input.to:
alan.aronowitz@enron.com, julia.murray@enron.com, mark.taylor@enron.com, 
	jeffrey.hodge@enron.com, richard.sanders@enron.com, 
	sheila.tweed@enron.com, lance.schuler-legal@enron.com, 
	barbara.gray@enron.com
quagga.input.xto: Alan Aronowitz, Julia Murray, Mark Taylor, Jeffrey T Hodge, Richard B Sanders, Sheila Tweed, Lance Schuler-Legal, Barbara N Gray
quagga.input.body:
ENA Legal will be participating in the above-referenced program again this 
year.   Please note that this program is geared towards first year minority & 
women law students.   I will be inviting each of you to participate in 
interviewing some of the candidates during the first two weeks of March.

Thanks in advance for your time.

Monica

**Please advise if anyone else should be included as an interviewer.
